trans-unit.source: Initial Backup Seeding

seg-source.mrk: Initial Backup Seeding

target.mrk: Seeding de la sauvegarde initiale

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to perform the initial backup of an agent connected through a slow link to an HyperStream repository (i.e., seeding).

seg-source.mrk: This topic describes how to perform the initial backup of an agent connected through a slow link to an HyperStream repository (i.e., seeding).

target.mrk: Cette rubrique décrit la procédure qui permet de réaliser la sauvegarde initiale d’un agent distant connecté sur un répertoire de stockage des données HyperStream via un réseau à connectivité lente (i.e., seeding).

trans-unit.source: The initial backup of a remote agent consists of:

seg-source.mrk: The initial backup of a remote agent consists of:

target.mrk: Les étapes de la sauvegarde initiale d’un agent distant sont :

trans-unit.source: Backing up the remote agent to a temporary <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> directly connected to the same LAN.

seg-source.mrk: Backing up the remote agent to a temporary <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> directly connected to the same LAN.

target.mrk: Sauvegarde de l’agent distant sur un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> temporaire connecté sur le même réseau LAN.

trans-unit.source: Moving the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to the central site, and replicating it to the main <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Moving the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to the central site, and replicating it to the main <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Déplacement du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> temporaire vers le site central puis réplication vers le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> principal.

trans-unit.source: Re-runing a full backup from the remote agents so that appropriate metadata is recorded in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> catalog.

seg-source.mrk: Re-runing a full backup from the remote agents so that appropriate metadata is recorded in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> catalog.

target.mrk: Relance d’une sauvegarde totale de l’agent distant pour enregistrer les métadonnées dans le catalogue <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: To perform the initial backup of a remote agent

seg-source.mrk: To perform the initial backup of a remote agent

target.mrk: Réaliser la sauvegarde initiale d’un agent distant

trans-unit.source: Install an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on a mobile machine (named B).

seg-source.mrk: Install an <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on a mobile machine (named B).

target.mrk: Installez un <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (nommé B) sur une machine portable.

trans-unit.source: Configure the replication on B to replicate any new stream to the main <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (named A) in the central site. See <MadCap:xref href="Simple_and_Hierarchical_replication.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Simple and Hierarchical Replication</MadCap:xref> for details.

seg-source.mrk: Configure the replication on B to replicate any new stream to the main <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (named A) in the central site.
See <MadCap:xref href="Simple_and_Hierarchical_replication.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Simple and Hierarchical Replication</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: Configurez la réplication sur B pour répliquer les nouveaux flux de données vers le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> principal (nommé A) dans le site central.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Simple_and_Hierarchical_replication.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Simple and Hierarchical Replication</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Stop the replication service on B (to prevent any new stream on B from being copied onto A while server B is away).

seg-source.mrk: Stop the replication service on B (to prevent any new stream on B from being copied onto A while server B is away).

target.mrk: Arrêtez le service de réplication sur B. Cela empêche que de nouveaux flux sur B ne soit copiés vers A alors que B est déconnecté du réseau.

trans-unit.source: Create a new HyperStream drive on the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server and set it to connect to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

seg-source.mrk: Create a new HyperStream drive on the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server and set it to connect to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

target.mrk: Créez un lecteur HyperStream sur le serveur <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et configurez-le pour se connecter au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

trans-unit.source: Create a new media pool and link it to the newly created HyperStream drive connected to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

seg-source.mrk: Create a new media pool and link it to the newly created HyperStream drive connected to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

target.mrk: Créez un jeu de médias et associez-le au lecteur HyperStream que vous venez de créer et qui est connecté au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

trans-unit.source: Create a new strategy for every remote host agent to be backed up, using the newly created HyperStream drive.

seg-source.mrk: Create a new strategy for every remote host agent to be backed up, using the newly created HyperStream drive.

target.mrk: Pour chaque agent distant à sauvegarder, créez une stratégie en utilisant le lecteur HyperStream que vous venez de créer.

trans-unit.source: Go to the remote site and connect the mobile <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B to the local LAN. At this point, the host(s) to be backed up and B are on the same LAN.

seg-source.mrk: Go to the remote site and connect the mobile <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B to the local LAN.
At this point, the host(s) to be backed up and B are on the same LAN.

target.mrk: Rendez-vous sur le site distant et connectez le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B portable au réseau LAN local.
A ce moment-là, B se trouve sur le même réseau LAN que l’agent à sauvegarder.

trans-unit.source: Do the first full backup of the host(s) located on the current LAN using the strategy you created and observe the new streams getting created on <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

seg-source.mrk: Do the first full backup of the host(s) located on the current LAN using the strategy you created and observe the new streams getting created on <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

target.mrk: Effectuez la première sauvegarde totale de l’agent situé sur le LAN à l’aide de la stratégie que vous avez créée. Les flux correspondants sont créés au fur et à mesure sur le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B.

trans-unit.source: Repeat step 7 and step 8 for every remote site.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat step 7 and step 8 for every remote site.

target.mrk: Répétez le step 7 et le step 8. pour chaque site distant.

trans-unit.source: Bring the mobile <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B back onto the main LAN where the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A is connected.

seg-source.mrk: Bring the mobile <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B back onto the main LAN where the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A is connected.

target.mrk: Rapatriez le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B sur le LAN principal où est connecté le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A.

trans-unit.source: Start the replication service on the server B so that all the streams previously created on it are copied onto the server A.

seg-source.mrk: Start the replication service on the server B so that all the streams previously created on it are copied onto the server A.

target.mrk: Démarrez le service de réplication sur le serveur B afin que les flux créés sur B soient copiés sur A.

trans-unit.source: Create a new media pool and associate it with the HyperStream drive(s) connected to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A.

seg-source.mrk: Create a new media pool and associate it with the HyperStream drive(s) connected to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A.

target.mrk: Créez un jeu de médias et associez-le aux lecteurs HyperStream connectés au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> A.

trans-unit.source: Modify the strategy created earlier on all the remote host agents in order to have it use the media pool created in step 12.

seg-source.mrk: Modify the strategy created earlier on all the remote host agents in order to have it use the media pool created in step 12.

target.mrk: Modifiez la stratégie créée sur les agents distants afin qu’elle utilise le jeu de médias créé à le step 12. .

trans-unit.source: Perform a new full backup for every remote agent.

seg-source.mrk: Perform a new full backup for every remote agent.

target.mrk: Démarrez une nouvelle sauvegarde totale de chaque agent distant.

trans-unit.source: Remove the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B from the loop and delete the HyperStream drive associated with the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B as well as the media pool associated with this drive.

seg-source.mrk: Remove the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B from the loop and delete the HyperStream drive associated with the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B as well as the media pool associated with this drive.

target.mrk: Retirez le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B du circuit et supprimez le lecteur HyperStream associé au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> B, ainsi que les jeux de médias associés à ce lecteur.
